Position.Title: Evaluation Advisor
Position.BriefRoleStatement: Monitoring evaluation and analysing educational programs to support strategic evaluation activity and corporate objectives.
Position.StatementOfDuties:
• Conducting, reporting on and communicating the findings of evaluations.
  • Designing evaluations and investigating current issues in evaluation and research in school education.
  • Identifying, collecting and analysing relevant data sets.
  • Leading and conducting research and evaluation activities, focus groups and interviews with students, parents and community, teachers and school leaders.
  • Liaising, negotiating, facilitating and participating in evaluations with stakeholders.
  • Managing evaluation projects in the School Operations and Performance division.
  • Preparing reports, minutes, briefings and bulletins.
